PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08172018-06-21,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of STEPHANIE BOWMAN of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 29, 2020, in the place of Jean Simon, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
